exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : '';
Url1 = `{{get('url1','0')}}`;
Url2 = `{{get('url2','0')}}`;
Url3 = `{{get('url3','0')}}`;
Url4 = `{{get('url4','0')}}`;
Url5 = `{{get('url5','0')}}`;
Url6 = `{{get('url6','0')}}`;
Cs = `{{get('cs','0')}}`;
Sort = `{{java.encodeURI(get('sort',Get('p')))}}`;
Sort_1 = `{{get('sort_1',Get('p'))}}`;
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    java.ajax(Get('url') + '/account/login');
    ck = cookie.getCookie(Get('url'));
    if (!ck.includes('user=deleted') && ck.includes('user=') && Account) {
        login(Put(JSON.stringify('【登录提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋' + '\n账号：' + Account + '\n┋┋' + '\n❤️登录成功❤️\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛')));
    } else {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {
        Fav1 = cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Fav_1"));
        Fav2 = cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Fav_2"));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的收藏', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}${Fav1}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('M')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}${Fav1}?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的合集', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}account_details&page_target=${Fav2}&page_elements=${Cs}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('MH')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}${Fav2}%2Fcollections?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('当前借阅', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url6}${Fav2}&page_elements=%5B%22lending%22%5D${Url3}{{page}}&sort=week%3Adesc${Url4}${Fav2}%2Floans%23on-loan`, 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('借阅历史', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url6}${Fav2}&page_elements=%5B%22lending%22%5D${Url3}{{page}}&sort=week%3Adesc${Url4}${Fav2}%2Floans%23history`, 1, 0.45, false));
}
    MY = Get('my');
    for (i in MY) {
        let title = MY[i].split("::")[0];
        let link = MY[i].split("::")[1];
        let target = String(link).replace(/.*\//, '');
        exploreUrl.push(explore(title, `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}${target}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('M')}}${Sort_1}${Url5}${link}?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 1, false));
    }
}
exploreUrl.push(explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨书籍✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
exploreUrl.push(explore('全部文本', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}texts${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('b')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}texts?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
exploreUrl.push(explore('全部书籍', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}books${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('b')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}books?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
TEXT = Get('text');
for (i in TEXT) {
    let title = TEXT[i].split("::")[0];
    let link = TEXT[i].split("::")[1];
    let target = String(link).replace(/.*\//, '');
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title, `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}${target}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('b')}}${Sort_1}${Url5}${link}?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 1, false));
}
exploreUrl.push(explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨视频✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.push(explore('全部视频', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}movies${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('v')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}movies?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
VIDEO = Get('video');
for (i in VIDEO) {
    let title = VIDEO[i].split("::")[0];
    let link = VIDEO[i].split("::")[1];
    let target = String(link).replace(/.*\//, '');
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title, `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}${target}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('v')}}${Sort_1}${Url5}${link}?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 1, false));
}
exploreUrl.push(explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨音频✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.push(explore('全部音频', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}audio${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('a')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}audio?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
    exploreUrl.push(explore('全部音乐', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}etree${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('a')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}etree?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
AUDIO = Get('audio');
for (i in AUDIO) {
    let title = AUDIO[i].split("::")[0];
    let link = AUDIO[i].split("::")[1];
    let target = String(link).replace(/.*\//, '');
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title, `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}${target}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('a')}}${Sort_1}${Url5}${link}?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 1, false));
}
exploreUrl.push(explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨图像✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.push(explore('全部图像', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}image${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('i')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}image?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
IMAGE = Get('image');
for (i in IMAGE) {
    let title = IMAGE[i].split("::")[0];
    let link = IMAGE[i].split("::")[1];
    let target = String(link).replace(/.*\//, '');
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title, `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}${target}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('i')}}${Sort_1}${Url5}${link}?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 1, false));
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/127.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36 EdgA/127.0.0.0",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers"),JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
User = Checkwait(User);
if (User == true) {
    var list = JSON.parse(result).response.body ? (JSON.parse(result).response.body.hits ? JSON.parse(result).response.body.hits.hits : (JSON.parse(result).response.body.page_elements.collections ? JSON.parse(result).response.body.page_elements.collections.hits.hits : (/history/.test(baseUrl) ? JSON.parse(result).response.body.page_elements.lending.loan_history : JSON.parse(result).response.body.page_elements.lending.loans))) : [];
    for (i in list) {
        if (!list[i].fields) continue;
        name = list[i].fields.title;
        var collections = [];
        var collectionElements = list[i].fields.collection;
        for (var j in collectionElements) {
            collections.push(String(collectionElements[j]));
        }
        collection = collections.join(',');
        if (list[i].fields.mediatype.includes('collection')) {
            author = '【默认合集】';
            if (collection.includes('texts')) {
                author = '【书籍合集】';
            } else if (collection.includes('movies')) {
                author = '【视频合集】';
            } else if (collection.includes('audio') || collection.includes('etree')) {
                author = '【音频合集】';
            } else if (collection.includes('image')) {
                author = '【图像合集】';
            } else {
                author = '【我的合集】';
            }
            kind = shortenNumber(list[i].fields.item_count || 0) + ' items' + ',' + formatBytes(list[i].fields.collection_size || 0) + ',collection' + ',' + collection;
            latest = '';
        } else {
            author = String(list[i].fields.creator).replace(/\,\s/g, ' ').replace(/\,/g, ' ').replace(/undefined/g, '');
            kind = String('✦ ' + shortenNumber(list[i].fields.downloads || 0) + ',' + '♥ ' + shortenNumber(list[i].fields.num_favorites || 0) + ',' + String(list[i].fields.mediatype).replace(/etree/, 'music') + ',' + list[i].fields.language + ',' + list[i].fields.year).replace(/undefined/g, '').replace(/✦\s\,/, '✦ 0,').replace(/♥\s\,/, '♥ 0,');
            latest = 'Addeddate: ' + String(list[i].fields.addeddate).replace(/T/, ' ').replace(/Z/, '');
        }
        intro = String(list[i].fields.description).replace(/undefined/g, '');
        cover = decodeURIComponent(Get('url') + '/services/img/' + list[i].fields.identifier);
        url = decodeURIComponent(Get('url') + '/details/' + list[i].fields.identifier);
        available = list[i].fields.lending___available_to_browse;
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16('Type' + url), list[i].fields.mediatype);
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16('Identifier' + url), list[i].fields.identifier);
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16('Name' + url), name);
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16('Author' + url), author);
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16('Kind' + url), kind);
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16('Cover' + url), cover);
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16('Intro' + url), intro);
        //cache.put(java.md5Encode16('Available' + url), available);
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16('Available' + url), true);
        data.push({
            'name': name,
            'author': author,
            'kind': kind,
            'word': '',
            'latest': latest,
            'intro': intro,
            'cover': cover,
            'url': url
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/&page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return '&page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var nextlist = JSON.parse(next).response.body ? (JSON.parse(next).response.body.hits ? JSON.parse(next).response.body.hits.hits : (JSON.parse(next).response.body.page_elements.collections ? JSON.parse(next).response.body.page_elements.collections.hits.hits : JSON.parse(next).response.body.page_elements.lending.loans)) : [];
    if (!list[0] || !nextlist[0] || list[0].fields.title == nextlist[0].fields.title) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

        }

            }

            }

                author = '【音频合集】';
            }
            if (collection.includes('image')) {
                author = '【图像合集】';
            }
            kind = shortenNumber(list[i].fields.item_count) + ' items' + ',' + formatBytes(list[i].fields.collection_size) + ',collection' + ',' + collection;

        intro = String(list[i].fields.description).replace(/undefined/g, '');
        cover = decodeURIComponent(Get('url') + '/services/img/' + list[i].fields.identifier);
        url = decodeURIComponent(Get('url') + '/details/' + list[i].fields.identifier);
        available = list[i].fields.lending___available_to_browse;

        cache.put(java.md5Encode16('Author' + url), author);
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16('Kind' + url), kind);
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16('Cover' + url), cover);
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16('Intro' + url), intro);
        //cache.put(java.md5Encode16('Available' + url), available);
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16('Available' + url), true);
        if (!(/data|web|account|software|other/.test(collection)) && !(/data|web|account|software|other/.test(list[i].fields.mediatype))) {

ruleContent.title:
<js>
if (Get('s') > 0) {
    var ComicId = cache.get(java.md5Encode16('ComicId' + book.bookUrl));
    var Epid = String(baseUrl).replace(/.*ep_id\"\:(\d+)\}.*/, '$1');
    var purl = 'https://www.biliplus.com/manga/?act=read&mangaid=' + ComicId + '&epid=' + Epid;
    var html = java.ajax(purl);
    if (/〔/.test(chapter.title)) {
        var title = chapter.title.match(/(.*)(〔.*)/);
        var Rtitle = title[1] + (html.includes('comic-single') ? '📡' : '') + title[2];
    } else {
        var Rtitle = chapter.title + (html.includes('comic-single') ? '📡' : '');
    }
    String(Rtitle).replace(/[📡]+/g, '📡');
}
</js>

Uid1 = cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "uid1")) || '';
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (!cookie.getCookie(Get('url')).includes('my=')) {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {                                        
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        var signdate = sign();
        cache.put("dmzj-sign", signdate);
        exploreUrl.push(explore(signdate + '✔️', '', 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的订阅', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'nnv3api')}}/UCenter/subscribeWithLevel?uid=${Uid}&sub_type=0&page={{page-1}}`, 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('浏览历史', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'nninterface')}}/api/getReInfoWithLevel/comic/${Uid}/{{page-1}}?uid=${Uid}`, 1, 0.25, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
T = `{{Get('t')}}`;
U = `{{Get('u')}}`;
U1 = `{{Get('u') < 3 ? Get('u') : '2'}}`;
url1 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'm')}}/rank/0-${T}-${U}-{{page-1}}.json?uid=${Uid1}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('人气', url1, 1, 0.25, false));
url2 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'm')}}/rank/1-0-${U1}-{{page-1}}.json?uid=${Uid1}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('吐槽', url2, 1, 0.25, false));

                'author': cache.get(java.md5Encode16(url + "Author")),
                'kind': s + ',' + k,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].sub_img,
                'url': url
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list || !list[0] || !JSON.parse(next)[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    } else if (baseUrl.includes('/getReInfoWithLevel/')) {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result);
        for (i in list) {
            var s = '';
            var k = '';
            var intro = '\nㅤ\n⏰时间：' + java.timeFormat(list[i].viewing_time) + '\n📖观看至：' + list[i].chapter_name;
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].comic_name,
                'author': cache.get(java.md5Encode16(url + "Author")),
                'kind': s + ',' + k,
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': intro,
                'cover': list[i].cover,
                'url': Get('url').replace(/www/, 'nnv4api') + '/v2/comic/detail/' + list[i].comic_id + '?uid=' + Uid1
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/(\d+)\?uid\=$/, function(match, p1) {return (parseInt(p1) + 1) + '?uid=';}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list || !list[0] || list[0].comic_id == JSON.parse(next)[0].comic_id) {
            Data();
        }
    } else if (baseUrl.includes('/rank/')) {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result);
        var D = ['日','周','月','总'];
        var K = ['人气:','吐槽:','订阅:'];
        var index = parseInt(baseUrl.replace(/.*(\d)\-\d\.json/, '$1'));
        var index1 = parseInt(baseUrl.replace(/.*rank\/(\d).*/, '$1'));
        for (i in list) {
            var s = D[index] + K[index1] + Num(list[i].num || list[i].vote_num || list[i].sub_num);
            var k = (list[i].status || '').replace(/[中已]/g, '') + ',' + (list[i].zone || list[i].readergroup || '') + ',' + list[i].types.replace(/\//g, ',');
            var latest = list[i].last_update_chapter_name || list[i].chapter_name;
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].name,
                'author': list[i].authors,
                'kind': s + ',' + k,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest + '〔' + String(java.timeFormat(list[i].last_updatetime*1000)).replace(/\//g, '-') + '〕',
                'intro': list[i].description,
                'cover': Get('url').replace(/www/, 'images') + '/' + list[i].cover,
                'url': Get('url').replace(/www/, 'nnv4api') + '/v2/comic/detail/' + list[i].id + '?uid=' + Uid1
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/(\d+).json$/, function(match, p1) {return (parseInt(p1) + 1) + '.json';}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list || !list[0] || !JSON.parse(next)[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    } else {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result);
        for (i in list) {
            var s = '✦ ' + Num(list[i].num);
            var k = list[i].status.replace(/[中已]/g, '') + ',' + list[i].types.replace(/\//g, ',');
            var latest = list[i].last_updatetime > 0 ? ('〔' + String(java.timeFormat(list[i].last_updatetime*1000)).replace(/\//g, '-') + '〕') : '';
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].title,
                'author': list[i].authors,
                'kind': s + ',' + k,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].cover,
                'url': Get('url').replace(/www/, 'nnv4api') + '/v2/comic/detail/' + list[i].id + '?uid=' + Uid1
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/(\d+).json$/, function(match, p1) {return (parseInt(p1) + 1) + '.json';}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list || !list[0] || !JSON.parse(next)[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);

eval(String(source.loginUrl));

var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
Headers.Authorization = ('Bearer ' + cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "token"))) || '';
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (!cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "token")) || cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "token")) == '') {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {                                        
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的订阅', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/sub/list?status=0&firstLetter=&page={{page}}&size=20,${JSON.stringify(Option)}`, 1, 0.25, false));
        //exploreUrl.push(explore('浏览历史', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/sub/list?status=0&firstLetter=&page={{page}}&size=20,${JSON.stringify(Option)}`, 1, 0.25, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
T = `{{Get('t')}}`;
U = `{{Get('u')}}`;
url1 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/rank/list?tag_id=0&by_time=${U}&rank_type=0&page={{page+1}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('人气', url1, 1, 0.25, false));
url2 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/rank/list?tag_id=0&by_time=${U}&rank_type=1&page={{page+1}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('吐槽', url2, 1, 0.25, false));
url3 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/rank/list?tag_id=0&by_time=${U}&rank_type=2&page={{page+1}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('订阅', url3, 1, 0.25, false));
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var Url = Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api') + '/app/v1/comic/filter/classify';
var kind = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Url)).data.classifyList[0].list;
R = `{{Get('r')+1}}`;
Cate = `{{get('cate',Get('o'))}}`;
Status = `{{get('status',Get('p'))}}`;
Zone = `{{get('zone',Get('q'))}}`;
for (i in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/filter/list?theme=${kind[i].tagId}&cate=${Cate}&status=${Status}&zone=${Zone}&sortType=${R}&page={{page}}&size=20`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].tagName, url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);

        }
    }

} else {

    url = `{{Get('url')}}/plugin.php?id=jameson_manhua&c=index&a=ku${String('&category_id=' + type[j].attr('data-value')).replace(/&category_id=empty/, '')}${Jindu}${Shuxing}&odfie=${Odfie}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(type[j].text(), url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (type.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (type.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}

JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  分　　类  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '全部漫画',
    '最新上架'
];
orderby = [
    '/classify',
    '/list/new'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${orderby[i]}?page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.45, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','恋爱','纯爱','古风','异能','悬疑','剧情','科幻',
    '奇幻','玄幻','穿越','冒险','推理','武侠','格斗','战争',
    '热血','搞笑','大女主','都市','总裁','后宫','日常','韩漫',
    '少年','其他'
];
type = [
    'type=all','type=lianai','type=chunai','type=gufeng','type=yineng','type=xuanyi','type=juqing','type=kehuan',
    'type=qihuan','type=xuanhuan','type=chuanyue','type=mouxian','type=tuili','type=wuxia','type=gedou','type=zhanzheng',
    'type=rexie','type=gaoxiao','type=danuzhu','type=dushi','type=zongcai','type=hougong','type=richang','type=hanman',
    'type=shaonian','type=qita'
];
Region = `{{get('region',Get('o'))}}`;
State = `{{get('state',Get('q'))}}`;
Filter = `{{get('filter',Get('p'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/classify?${type[j]}${Region}${State}${Filter}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(30, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

    '人气',
    '更新',
    '评分',
    '收藏'
];
orderby = [
    '&orderby=click',
    '&orderby=date',
    '&orderby=score',
    '&orderby=shoucang'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/getsortlist/?comic_sort=${orderby[i]}&search_type=&search_key=&page={{page}}&size=48`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','热血','机战','运动','推理','冒险','搞笑','战争',
    '神魔','忍者','竞技','悬疑','社会','恋爱','宠物','吸血',
    '萝莉','后宫','御姐','霸总','玄幻','古风','历史','漫改',
    '游戏','穿越','恐怖','真人','科幻','都市','武侠','修真',
    '生活','动作'
];
link = [
    '','rexue','jizhan','yundong','tuili','maoxian','gaoxiao','zhanzhen',
    'shenmo','renzhe','jingji','xuanyi','shehui','lianai','chongwu','xixue',
    'luoli','hougong','yujie','bazong','xuanhuan','gufeng','lishi','mangai',
    'youxi','chuanyue','kongbu','zhenren','kehuan','dushi','wuxia','xiuzhen',
    'shenghuo','dongzuo'
];
OrderBy = `{{get('orderBy',Get('o'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/getsortlist/?comic_sort=${link[j]}${OrderBy}&search_type=&search_key=&page={{page}}&size=48`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(40, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);

    '欧美',

];

    'qita',
];
for (i in rank2) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/manga-genre/${orderby2[i]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank2[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '复仇','古风','奇幻','逆袭','异能','宅向','穿越','热血',

];

    'fuchou','gufeng','qihuan','nixi','yineng','zhaixiang','chuanyue','rexue',
    'chunai','xitong','zhongsheng','maoxian','lingyi','danvzhu','juqing','lianai',
    'xuanhuan','nvshen','kehuan','mohuan','tuili','lieqi','zhiyu','doushi',
    'yixing','qingchun','mori','xuanyi','xiuxian','zhandou'
];
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/manga-tag/${link[j]}/page/{{page}}`;

<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '年度',
    '本月',
    '本周',
    '今日',
    '上升',
    '评分',
    '收藏'
];
orderby = [
    'hot',
    'month',
    'week',
    'day',
    'ascension',
    'score',
    'fav'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/index.php/custom/${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','热血','冒险','科幻','霸总','玄幻','校园','修真',
    '搞笑','穿越','后宫','耽美','恋爱','悬疑','恐怖','战争',
    '动作','同人','竞技','励志','架空','灵异','百合','古风',
    '生活','真人','都市','其他','日常','其它','纯爱','推理',
    '奇幻','格斗','大女主','剧情','总裁','武侠','异能','少年',
    '韩漫'
];
link = [
    '','/tags/6','/tags/7','/tags/8','/tags/9','/tags/10','/tags/11','/tags/12',
    '/tags/13','/tags/14','/tags/15','/tags/16','/tags/17','/tags/18','/tags/19','/tags/20',
    '/tags/21','/tags/22','/tags/23','/tags/24','/tags/25','/tags/26','/tags/27','/tags/28',
    '/tags/29','/tags/30','/tags/31','/tags/48','/tags/49','/tags/50','/tags/51','/tags/52',
    '/tags/53','/tags/54','/tags/55','/tags/56','/tags/57','/tags/58','/tags/59','/tags/60',
    '/tags/61'
];
Order = `{{get('order',Get('p'))}}`;
O = `{{Get('o')}}`;
Q = `{{Get('q')}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/index.php/category/list/${O}/finish/${Q}/order/${Order}${link[j]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(50, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '年度',
    '本月',
    '本周',
    '今日',
    '上升',
    '评分',
    '收藏'
];
orderby = [
    'hot',
    'month',
    'week',
    'day',
    'ascension',
    'score',
    'fav'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/index.php/custom/${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','热血','冒险','科幻','霸总','玄幻','校园','修真',
    '搞笑','穿越','后宫','耽美','恋爱','悬疑','恐怖','战争',
    '动作','同人','竞技','励志','架空','灵异','百合','古风',
    '生活','真人','都市','其他','爱情','武侠','格斗','侦探',
    '推理','剧情','其它','总裁','奇幻','韩漫','纯爱','日常',
    '少年','大女主','异能'
];
link = [
    '','/tags/6','/tags/7','/tags/8','/tags/9','/tags/10','/tags/11','/tags/12',
    '/tags/13','/tags/14','/tags/15','/tags/16','/tags/17','/tags/18','/tags/19','/tags/20',
    '/tags/21','/tags/22','/tags/23','/tags/24','/tags/25','/tags/26','/tags/27','/tags/28',
    '/tags/29','/tags/30','/tags/31','/tags/48','/tags/49','/tags/50','/tags/51','/tags/52',
    '/tags/53','/tags/294','/tags/295','/tags/296','/tags/297','/tags/298','/tags/299','/tags/300',
    '/tags/301','/tags/302','/tags/303'
];
order = [
    'hits',
    'addtime'
];
Order = `{{get('order',Get('p'))}}`;
O = `{{Get('o')}}`;
Q = `{{Get('q')}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/index.php/category/list/${O}/finish/${Q}/order/${Order}${link[j]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(52, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
title = [
    '人气',
    '点击',
    '订阅',
    '更新'
];
var host = `{{Get('url')}}`;
orderby = [
    '/rank/popularity',
    '/rank/click',
    '/rank/subscribe',
    '/update/{{page}}/'
];
Time = `{{get('time',Get('t'))}}`;
for (i in title) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${orderby[i]}${Time}/`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var Url = Get('url') + '/list/';
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(Url));
var list = J.select('.filter-item')[2] ? J.select('.filter-item.clearfix')[2].select('li') : [];
O1 = `{{get('o1',Get('o'))}}`;
P1 = `{{get('p1',Get('p'))}}`;
Q1 = `{{get('q1',Get('q'))}}`;
R1 = `{{get('r1',Get('r'))}}`;
S1 = `{{get('s1',Get('s'))}}`;
for (i in list) {
    var kind = i + 1;
    var kind1 = String(list[i].select('a').attr('href')).replace(/\/list\//, '-').replace(/\/$/, '').replace(/^\-$/, '');
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/list/${O1}${P1}${kind1}${S1}${Q1}${R1}{{page}}/`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(list[i].text(), url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/127.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/127.0.0.0",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers"),JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

    var list =  java.getElements('.item-lg||.item-sm');

        name = list[i].select('.ell').text();
        kind = Num(String(list[i].select('.click').text()).replace(/.*：/g, ''));

        });

            Data();
        }

    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}

eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','神幻','女主','韩漫','百合','修真','恐怖','耽美',
    '穿越','悬疑','真人','古风','科幻','热血','霸总','恋爱',
    '生活','后宫','搞笑','校园'
];
link = [
    '全部','神幻','女主','韩漫','百合','修真','恐怖','耽美',
    '穿越','悬疑','真人','古风','科幻','热血','霸总','恋爱',
    '生活','后宫','搞笑','校园'
];
Area = `{{get('area',Get('o'))}}`;
End = `{{get('end',Get('q'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?cate=${link[j]}&area=${Area}&end=${End}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(52, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var html = java.ajax(Get('url'));
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var list = J.select('.header-search script');
var ss = String(list).split("'")[5];
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    return Get('url') + ss + e + '&sn=pp';
}(key));
</js>

bookSourceGroup: 🍿 日常,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '精品榜',
    '人气榜',
    '推荐榜',
    '黑马榜',
    '更新榜',
    '新漫画'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/rank/${parseInt(i)+1}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
sort = [
    '冒险','热血','都市','玄幻','悬疑','耽美','恋爱','生活',
    '搞笑','穿越','修真','后宫','女主','古风','连载','完结'
];
for (i in sort) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/sort/${parseInt(i)+1}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(sort[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (sort.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (sort.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(52, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>
header:

var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/127.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36 EdgA/127.0.0.0",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers"),JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

var exploreUrl = [];

if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (!java.ajax(Get('url')).includes(Account)) {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        var signdate = sign();
        cache.put("xxfz-sign", signdate);
        exploreUrl.push(explore(signdate + '✔️', '', 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('收藏', `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/favorite?tp=1-{{page}}&apimhstatus=all`, 1, 0.45, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
url1 = `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/getpage/tp/1-topestmh-<,{{page}}>`;

O = `{{Get('o')}}`;
P = `{{Get('p')}}`;
Q = `{{Get('q')}}`;
for (i in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/cate/tp/1-${kind[i].attr('data-value')}-${P}-1-{{page}}-${Q}-1-${O}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].attr('data-value') + kind[i].select('span').text(), url, 1, 0.25, false));
}

   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false));

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
User = Checkwait(User);
if (User == true) {
    var Date = String(java.timeFormat(new Date().getTime())).replace(/\d+\/(.*)\s.*/, '$1');
    if (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0 && !Date.includes(cache.get("xxfz-sign"))) {
        var signdate = sign();
        cache.put("xxfz-sign", signdate);
    }
    if (baseUrl.includes('/favorite')) {
        var list = JSON.parse(result).result.data;
        for (i in list) {
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].title,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': list[i].lastcapter + '〔' + list[i].update_time + '〕',
                'intro': list[i].desc,
                'cover': /http/.test(list[i].image) ? list[i].image : (Get('url') + list[i].image),
                'url': Get('url') + '/home/book/index/id/' + list[i].bid
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/1-(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return '1-' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).result.data[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    } else {
        var list = JSON.parse(result).result.list;
        for (i in list) {
            var kind = (list[i].mhstatus > 0 ? '完结' : '连载') + ',' + (list[i].limitVip == 'false' ? '' : 'VIP') + ',' + list[i].keyword;
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].title,
                'author': list[i].auther.replace(/,/g, '/'),
                'kind': kind,
                'word': '',
                'latest': list[i].last_chapter_title + '〔' + (/-/.test(list[i].update_time) ? list[i].update_time : String(java.timeFormat(list[i].update_time*1000)).replace(/\//g, '-')) + '〕',
                'intro': list[i].desc,
                'cover': /http/.test(list[i].image) ? list[i].image : (Get('url') + list[i].image),
                'url': Get('url') + '/home/book/index/id/' + list[i].id
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/(\d+)(-\d-\d-\d)$/, function(match, p1, p2) {return (parseInt(p1) + 1) + p2;}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).result.list[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "searchkey"), e);
    return Get('url') + '/home/api/searchk?keyword=' + e.replace(/\s.*$|\/.*$/g, '') + '&type=1&pageNo={{page}}';
}(key));
</js>

headers={

}
cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers"),JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '总榜',
    '月榜',
    '周榜',
    '日榜',
    '最近更新',
    '新书发布',
    '推荐漫画'
];
orderby = [
    '/ranking/all',
    '/ranking/monthly',
    '/ranking/weekly',
    '/ranking/daily',
    '/update',
    '/update/newbook',
    '/update/recommend'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '正妹','恋爱','出版','肉欲','浪漫','大尺度','巨乳',
    '有夫之妇','女大生','狗血剧','同居','好友','调教','动作','后宫',
    '不伦','3D','校园','耽美','日漫'
];
link = [
    '正妹','恋爱','出版漫画','肉慾','浪漫','大尺度','巨乳',
    '有夫之婦','女大生','狗血劇','同居','好友','調教','动作','後宮',
    '不倫','3D','校園','耽美','日漫'
];
Ob = `{{get('ob',Get('p'))}}`;
St = `{{get('st',Get('q'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/comics/${link[j]}/ob/${Ob}/st/${St}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

    '排行榜',

    '已完结'
];

    '`${host}/top.html`',

    '`${host}/complete/?page={{page}}`'
];

}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
type = [
    '全部',
    '都市',
    '出版',
    '剧情',
    '恋爱',
    '动作',
    '校园',
    '恐怖',
    '耽美',
    '搞笑',
    '爱情',
    '生活'
];
tag = [
    '全部',
    '都市',
    '出版漫画',
    '剧情',
    '恋爱',
    '动作',
    '校园',
    '恐怖',
    '耽美',
    '搞笑',
    '爱情',
    '生活'
];
End = `{{get('end',Get('q'))}}`;
for (i in type) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?tag=${tag[i]}${End}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(type[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (type.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (type.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

headers={

    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers"),JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

var data = [];

            'latest': '〔' + list[i].select('.s713')[2].text() + '〕',

        });

        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
